title: ULRICO2468

content: i seek to good software compatible win 10 to mine CRP coins (cranepay coins) with all CPUi run windows 10 Home edition in 64 bits

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: CPU Minerhttps://aikapool.com/crp/index.php?page=gettingstartedA quick search finds only CPU MinerWorking mining poolshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/cranepayThe coin is not very popular and there are also asics for it. I do not know what kind of processor you have, but mining on the processor is now very unprofitable
